paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted genetic variant information specifically for BRCA2, including penetrance data.

patients.demographics: early onset women diagnosed with TNBC at ages 35 and 38
patients.phenotype: triple negative breast cancer and ovarian cancer

individual_records.evidence_sentence: The BRCA2 c.1310_1313delAAGA variant, a specific founder variant from the North-East of Morocco, was detected in early onset women diagnosed with both TNBC (at the age of 35) and OC (at the age of 38).

The BRCA2 c.1310_1313delAAGA variant, a specific founder variant from the North-East of Morocco, was detected in early onset women diagnosed with both TNBC (at the age of 35) and OC (at the age of 38).

functional_data.summary: The variant causes a frame-shift which changes a Lysine to an Isoleucine at codon 437 and creates a premature stop codon at position 22 of the new reading frame.

variants.segregation_data: The variant is found in affected individuals.
variants.evidence_level: strong evidence for pathogenicity based on clinical presentation and family history.
variants.additional_notes: This variant is a founder mutation in the North-East of Morocco.
key_quotes: The BRCA2 c.1310_1313delAAGA variant, a specific founder variant from the North-East of Morocco, was detected in early onset women diagnosed with both TNBC (at the age of 35) and OC (at the age of 38).

patients.demographics: one patient without family history, diagnosed at age 36

individual_records.evidence_sentence: The BRCA2 c.1658T>G (p.Leu553Ter) variant, located in exon 11, causes a non-sense substitution. It was observed in one patient without family history, diagnosed with TNBC at the age of 36.

functional_data.summary: The variant causes a non-sense substitution leading to a truncated protein.

variants.segregation_data: The variant is found in an affected individual.
variants.evidence_level: strong evidence for pathogenicity based on clinical presentation.
variants.additional_notes: The variant was associated with breast-ovarian cancer and hereditary cancer-predisposing syndrome.
key_quotes: The BRCA2 c.1658T>G (p.Leu553Ter) variant, located in exon 11, causes a non-sense substitution. It was observed in one patient without family history, diagnosed with TNBC at the age of 36.

extraction_metadata.notes: All relevant data for BRCA2 variants were successfully extracted.
